name: Golisopod
flavorText: With a flashing slash of its giant sharp claws, it cleaves seawater—or even air—right in two.

abilities.name: Armor
abilities.text: This Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Resolute Claws
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon-GX or a Pokémon-EX, this attack does 70 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
